detaileddescription.para: macro to set maximum allowed slope duration
macro used to represent the delay needed between changing the configuration and enabling the interrupt variable to check initialization status
macro used to disable the interrupt
macro used to enable the interrupt

briefdescription.para: Function to Configure interrupts of Bma280. Before calling this API Update the below information in the appropriate structure 1) Update callback function in Bma280Utils_InfoPtr_T. 2) Update the type of callback(deferred or real time) in Bma280Utils_InfoPtr_T. 3) Update interrupt type and channel to Which interrupt needs be associated in Bma280Utils_ConfigInterrupt_T. 4) Update Bma280Utils_IntrConfigPtr_T with appropriate interrupt configuration After calling this API the given interrupt will be enabled on the given channel and the callback will be associated with the interrupt.

parameterdescription.para: :Structure holding the bma280 specific configurations.Callback for the interrupt and its type should be given in this handle
:Structure holding the information about interrupt type,channel and its related configuration should be given here
Configuration of interrupt for BMA280 is success.
when any of the input parameter(interruptConfig & interruptConfig->configInterrupt) is NULL.
when any of the input parameter for BST library API is NULL.
when error is returned from BST library API.
when the interrupt configuration parameter is invalid.
when this api is called before initializing Bma280 sensor

simplesect.para: The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).

parameterdescription.para: Delay in milliseconds
:structure holding the Bma280 specific configurations
:type of interrupt that needs to be disabled
:interrupt channel in which interrupt needs to be disabled
BMA280 disable interrupt success
when any of the input parameter for BST library API is NULL.
when error is returned from BST library API.
when the interrupt configuration parameter is invalid.
when this api is called before initializing Bma280 sensor.

simplesect.para: The return value consist of (First MSB Byte represents Package ID,Next Byte represents Severity and Last 2LSB Bytes represents error code).

briefdescription.para: Function to initialize Bma280. This needs to be called before calling any other API.

parameterdescription.para: :structure holding the bma280 specific configurations
BMA280 is initialized successfully.
when any of the input parameter(bma280Info->ISRCallback or bma280Info) is NULL.
when any of the input parameter for BST library API is NULL.
when error is returned from BST library API.
When initialization is already done.

simplesect.para: In case of other failures refer BSP_SensorNode_Enable or #I2CSensorTransceiver_Init API's.
1) The return value consist of (First MSB Byte represents Package ID,Next Byte represents Severity and Last 2LSB Bytes represents error code).
2) The support of multiple instances is not possible due to the limitation in the BST library.
3) Calling Bma280 initialization API present in sensorUtils (Bma280Utils_initialize) and BST library (bma2x2_init) concurrently will lead to unexpected behaviour.

briefdescription.para: Function to read remapped Bma280 data.

parameterdescription.para: :structure holding the Bma280 specific configurations. The information about remap configuration should be given in this struct
: while calling this API structure will hold the Bma280 data that needs to be the remapped. After calling this API the structure will hold remapped data
BMA280 axis remap success
when any of the input parameter is NULL.
when this api is called before initializing Bma280 sensor.

simplesect.para: In case of other failures refer AxisRemap_remapSensorData API.
The return value consist of (First MSB Byte represents Package ID,Next Byte represents Severity and Last 2LSB Bytes represents error code).

inbodydescription.para: copying the actual sensor data into a local variable

briefdescription.para: Function to uninitialize Accel.After calling this API sensor is no more usable without initializing it again by calling Bma280Utils_initialize() API.

parameterdescription.para: :structure holding the bma280 specific configurations
BMA280 un-initialization success
when bma280Info is NULL.
when this api is called before initializing Bma280 sensor.

simplesect.para: In case of other failures refer BSP_SensorNode_Disable or BSP_SensorNode_IsAllNodesDisabled or #I2CSensorTransceiver_Deinit API.
The return value consist of (First MSB Byte represents Package ID,Next Byte represents Severity and Last 2LSB Bytes represents error code).

briefdescription.para: Function responsible to configure interrupt for new sensor data.

parameterdescription.para: - Channel to which interrupt needs to be configured
BMA280 sensor configure slope interrupt success.
BMA280 sensor configure slope interrupt failed.
BMA280 sensor configure slope interrupt failed because of invalid input parameter.

briefdescription.para: Function responsible to configure interrupt conditions in the support layer.

parameterdescription.para: structure representing to slope interrupt configuration
Channel to which interrupt needs to be configured
BMA280 sensor configure slope interrupt success.
BMA280 sensor configure slope interrupt failed.
BMA280 sensor configure slope interrupt failed because of invalid input parameter.

briefdescription.para: This function maps error codes returned from BMA280 library to retcode values.

parameterdescription.para: - Return value from BMA2X2 library
BMA2X2 sensor API call success
BMA2X2 sensor API call failed
BMA2X2 sensor API call failed because of NULL input parameter
